title: Music streaming and playlist management
content:
# Spotify App Guide

## Navigation
- **Bottom Navigation Bar**: Switch between **Home** (recommendations), **Search** (find music), **Your Library** (saved content), and **Create** (plus icon).
- **Content Filters**: On the Home screen, use the top chips to filter by **All**, **Music**, or **Podcasts**.
- **Side Menu**: Tap your **Profile Picture** (top-left) to access **Settings and privacy**, **What's new**, and account switching.
- **Library Tabs**: In "Your Library," filter views using the **Playlists**, **Podcasts**, and **Artists** chips at the top.

## Search
- **Search Bar**: Tap the **Search** tab and use the bar labeled **"What do you want to listen to?"**.
- **Recents**: The search screen displays a list of recently played songs or playlists (e.g., "The Nights", "Qaafirana"). Use the **"X"** to remove items from history.

## Common Actions
- **Playback Control**: The mini-player at the bottom displays the current song ("Ab Saunp..."), a **Play/Pause** button, and a **Checkmark** (saved status).
- **Manage Library**: In "Your Library," pin important items like **"Liked Songs"** or **"New Episodes"** to the top (indicated by a green pin icon).
- **Check Plan**: View your subscription status (e.g., **"Student"** Premium tag) in the side menu.
- **Create**: Tap the **Plus (+)** icon in the top right of the Library or the bottom bar to create a new playlist.

## Tips
- **Daylist**: Look for the **"daylist"** tile on the Home screen for a hyper-personalized playlist that updates throughout the day.
- **Sound Capsule**: Access **"Your Sound Capsule"** from the side menu to view listening insights.
- **Yearly Wrap**: The library automatically saves your yearly recap playlists, such as **"Your Top Songs 2025"**.
